Thanks to the R community for their wonderful tools that enable a fanciful exploration into MIDI mangling like this one.

Keeping a list of packages I used here so it is easier for `grateful::scan_packages` to find everything

```{r}
library(pyramidi)
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)
library(usethis)
library(pkgdown)
library(lsa)
library(av)
library(ggplot2)
library(badger)
library(quarto)
library(remotes)
library(devtools)
library(rmarkdown)
library(knitr)
library(roxygen2)
library(tidyr)
library(tibble)
library(tuneR)
```
